aka: An Eternal Day in Sabana Grande

writer.name: Manuel de Pedro Manuel de Pedro

director.name: Manuel de Pedro Manuel de Pedro

this_title: En Sabana Grande siempre es de día
trans_title: 萨巴纳·格兰德永恒的一日
An Eternal Day in Sabana Grande
introduction: 委内瑞拉儿童故事片，讲述一个小男孩在萨巴纳·格兰德经历了生命中最悲喜交织的24小时。影片属于典型的80年代南美社会写实主义电影风格，通过一个孩子的目光看待委内瑞拉社会所存在的各种社会问题。This Venezuelan movie tells the story of adventures and misadventures by passing a small and unsuspecting boy of just ten years while desperately tries to fulfill and to realize their greatest desire: to know and be reunited with her father. In this quest rampant, our little friend will walk for the great Caracas and hear first hand the rigors of living in the jungle concrete jungle which for many is and always will be the day.
chinese_title: 萨巴纳·格兰德永恒的一日
foreign_title: En Sabana Grande siempre es de día
